Package camzup.core

Class Edge3

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Edge3
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Edge3>
public class Edge3
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Edge3>
Organizes components of a 3D mesh into an edge with an origin and destination. This is not used by a mesh internally; it is created upon retrieval from a mesh.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    Vert3 dest
    The destination vertex.
    Vert3 origin
    The origin vertex.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Edge3()
    The default constructor.
    Edge3​(Vec3 coOrigin, Vec2 txOrigin, Vec3 nmOrigin, Vec3 coDest, Vec2 txDest, Vec3 nmDest)
    Constructs an edge from the origin and destination coordinate, texture coordinate and normal data.
    Edge3​(Vert3 origin, Vert3 dest)
    Constructs an edge from two vertices, an origin and destination.

  • Constructor Details

    • Edge3

      public Edge3()
      The default constructor. Creates two empty vertices.

    • Edge3

      public Edge3​(Vec3 coOrigin, Vec2 txOrigin, Vec3 nmOrigin, Vec3 coDest, Vec2 txDest, Vec3 nmDest)
      Constructs an edge from the origin and destination coordinate, texture coordinate and normal data. Creates two vertex objects.
      Parameters:
      coOrigin - origin coordinate
      txOrigin - origin texture coordinate
      nmOrigin - origin normal
      coDest - destination coordinate
      txDest - destination texture coordinate
      nmDest - destination normal

    • Edge3

      public Edge3​(Vert3 origin, Vert3 dest)
      Constructs an edge from two vertices, an origin and destination.
      Parameters:
      origin - the origin
      dest - the destination

    • scaleGlobal

      public Edge3 scaleGlobal​(float scalar)
      Scales the coordinates of this edge. The texture coordinates are unaffected. Uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's position.
      Parameters:
      scalar - the scalar
      Returns:
      this edge
      See Also:
      Vec3.mul(Vec3, float, Vec3)

    • scaleGlobal

      public Edge3 scaleGlobal​(Vec3 scalar)
      Scales the coordinates of this edge. The texture coordinates are unaffected. Uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's position.
      Parameters:
      scalar - the nonuniform scalar
      Returns:
      this edge
      See Also:
      Vec3.mul(Vec3, Vec3, Vec3)

    • scaleLocal

      public Edge3 scaleLocal​(float scalar)
      Scales the coordinates of this edge. Subtracts the edge's centroid from each vertex, scales, then adds the centroid.
      Parameters:
      scalar - the uniform scalar
      Returns:
      this edge
      See Also:
      Vec3.sub(Vec3, Vec3, Vec3), Vec3.mul(Vec3, float, Vec3), Vec3.add(Vec3, Vec3, Vec3)

    • scaleLocal

      Parameters:
      scalar - the nonuniform scalar
      Returns:
      this edge
      See Also:

    • azimuth

      public static float azimuth​(Edge3 edge)
      Finds the azimuth of an edge. Subtracts the destination coordinate from that of the origin, then supplies the difference to atan2 .
      Parameters:
      edge - the edge
      Returns:
      the heading
      See Also:
      Utils.atan2(float, float)

    • eval

      public static Vec3 eval​(Edge3 edge, float step, Vec3 target)
      Finds a point on the edge given a factor in the range [0.0, 1.0] . Uses linear interpolation from the origin coordinate to that of the destination.
      Parameters:
      edge - the edge
      step - the step
      target - the output vector
      Returns:
      the point

    • inclination

      public static float inclination​(Edge3 edge)
      Finds the inclination of an edge. Subtracts the destination coordinate from that of the origin, then supplies the difference to arc sine .
      Parameters:
      edge - the edge
      Returns:
      the heading
      See Also:
      Utils.invHypot(float, float, float), Utils.asin(float)

    • mag

      public static float mag​(Edge3 edge)
      Finds the Euclidean distance from the edge's origin coordinate to that of its destination.
      Parameters:
      edge - the edge
      Returns:
      the magnitude
      See Also:
      Vec3.distEuclidean(Vec3, Vec3)

    • magSq

      public static float magSq​(Edge3 edge)
      Finds the squared Euclidean distance from the edge's origin coordinate to that of its destination.
      Parameters:
      edge - the edge
      Returns:
      the magnitude
      See Also:
      Vec3.distSq(Vec3, Vec3)

    • projectVector

      public static Vec3 projectVector​(Edge3 edge, Vec3 v, Vec3 target)
      Projects a vector, representing a point, onto an edge. The scalar projection is clamped to the range [0.0, 1.0], meaning the projection will not exceed the edge's origin and destination.
      Parameters:
      edge - the edge
      v - the input vector
      target - the output vector
      Returns:
      the projection
      See Also:
      Utils.clamp01(float)
